meta_component.meta_title: Tony de Faria - Photography, Writing, Coding and Eating
meta_component.meta_description: Born in Africa and raised in Europe. Has a curious and creative mindset, leading to experiment with all sorts of mediums. Passionate about Humanity.
meta_component.meta_keywords: creative, concept, artist, photographer, writer, technologist

hero_component.title: The unknown is an opportunity to learn
hero_component.description:
Hi! I'm Tony, a self-taught creative thinker.
I like to use multiple mediums to express my thoughts and ideas.
I'm passionate about stories that have humanity, empathy and food.

pages.title: Reach out.
pages.description:
Do you have a question?
Are you curious about my work?

Then, regardless of your motivation to get in touch, do it.
I will happily reply.
